headline: BlackRock’s Bitcoin ETF Investors Came Late to the Crypto Party

headline: Harvard Bets Big on Bitcoin With $443M Stake, Outpacing Gold 2-to-1

According to Matt Hougan, Bitwise CIO, Harvard simultaneously increased its gold ETF holdings by 99% to $235 million, allocating to Bitcoin ...

headline: Harvard University Stacking More Bitcoin Over Gold, Bitwise CIO Matt Hougan Reveals

headline: GOLD ROYALTY TO ACQUIRE PRODUCING PEDRA BRANCA GOLD AND COPPER ROYALTY
summary: Gold Royalty Corp. ("Gold Royalty" or the "Company") (NYSE American: GROY) is pleased to announce that it has entered into an agreement to acquire an existing royalty (the "Royalty") on the Pedra Branca mine, from BlackRock World Mining Trust plc ("BlackRock") for $70 million in cash (the "Transaction").
